biography.content: Founder, President and Chief Scientific Officer of Akshaya Bio Inc., a biotechnology company. Previously, Executive Vice President and Chief Technology Officer of Paladin Biosciences, a division of Paladin Labs Inc.  Adjunct Faculty, University of Alberta, Edmonton. Co-inventor of ChimigenÂ® Vaccine Platform Technology. Developing vaccines for HBV, HCV, HIV and Cancer. Was Senior Vice President of Research and Development and a founding member of ViRexx Medical Corp. Previously, a Research Scientist at the Glaxo Heritage Research Institute, University of Alberta. Received Ph.D in Biochemistry from the Indian Institute of Sciences (Bangalore, India). Had postdoctoral training at the University of Wisconsin in Madison, WI, USA and the University of Alberta (Edmonton, Alberta, Canada).
